title: Online Self-Directed Learning Program for Improving Basic Job Competencies Based on NCS

context.prior_knowledge: Essential language proficiency for job performance and foundational expertise in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A non-degree learning environment for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to enhance job competencies, with a corporate education system enabling flexible learning via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can self-directively improve five job-related competencies selected from the NCS top 10 basic job skills.
Learners can achieve over 80% proficiency in language-related job skills (e.g., business document writing, communication, problem-solving) through online learning modules.
Learners can comprehensively demonstrate NCS core competencies applicable to job situations in the final evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
